accessarea.title: Access Area Migraties
accessarea.description: DSLAMs involved in Access Area Migrations

transport.title: Transport instances
transport.description: List of transport instances and bandwiths filtered on WSO

grabber.title: Grabber (RODGS)
grabber.description: Filter services from kanvas or the availibility checker

contractor.title: Escalatiematrix
contractor.description: Mailadresses and phonenumbers sorted per contractor

accessarea-migration.title: Migrations per DSLAM
accessarea-migration.description: Fill in Dslam name, for example: ZL-Z-DSLA-5. When migration date is today, the dslams has been migrated.

transport-instance.title: Transport Instances
transport-instance.description: Enter name of WSO, for example: DSLW with accessarea 45 (AA/45). Result will give you which WAP vlan the transport instance is configurated on and how much bandwith is ordered.

grabber.title: Grabber (RODGS)
grabber.description: Grab service ids from KANVAS or the Availibility checker

contractor.title: Change contracter
contractor.name: Contractor:
contractor.information-description: You can add important information here

current.title: Employees
current.description: Here you can modify employees or appoint roles

signin.title: Log in
signin.not_activated: You account has not been approved by administrator

signup.title: Sign up for an new account
signup.success: Your account has been succesfully registered, but has to be approved by the admin. When this has been done, you will get an email with a password you can use to log into the app. After logging in for the first time, you can change your password.
signup.too-long: If the activations takes to long, please contact the admin.

change_password.send: Email with instructions has been send
change_password.title: Change password

requirements.special: At least 1 number and one special character

messages.alpha_dash: {field} can only contain letters, numerics and dashes
messages.alpha_num: {field} can only contain letters and numerics
messages.alpha_spaces: {field} can only contain letters and spaces
messages.digits: {field} has to be an numeric and contain exactly 0:{length} characters
messages.dimensions: {field} has to be 0:{width} pixels wide and 1:{height} pixels high
messages.email: {field} has to be a valid emailaddress
messages.ext: {field} has to be a valid file
messages.one_of: {field} has to be a valid value
messages.mimes: {field} has to have a valid file type
messages.min: {field} has to be a minimum of 0:{length} characters
messages.emailContainsDomain: {field} has to have the kpn.com extenstion!
messages.changepassword.regex: has to contain uppercase, lowercase, numeric and special characters
